Components

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Banners

Banners can help divide yours sections
Banner Header

Title

Subheader

Banner Footer
<div class="banner">
    <div class="banner-header">
        <h5>Banner Header</h5>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-body">
        <div class="container">
            <h1 class="header">Title</h1>
            <h2 class="subheader">Subheader</h2>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-footer">
        <h5>Banner Footer</h5>
    </div>
</div>

Sizes

Banners come in different sizes
Banner Header

Large Banner

Subheader

Banner Footer
<div class="banner large">
    <div class="banner-header">
        <h5>Banner Header</h5>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-body">
        <div class="container">
            <h1 class="header">Large Banner</h1>
            <h2 class="subheader">Subheader</h2>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-footer">
        <h5>Banner Footer</h5>
    </div>
</div>

Subheader

Banner Footer

        <h5>Banner Header</h5>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-body">
        <div class="container">
            <h1 class="header">Fullscreen Banner</h1>
            <h2 class="subheader">Subheader</h2>
        </div>
    </div>

        <h5>Banner Footer</h5>
    </div>
</div>

Alignment

Align banner text using .text-left, .text-right, and .text-center
Text Fixed to Right

Text Fixed to Center

Text Fixed to Left
<div class="banner">
  <div class="banner-header text-right">
    <h5>Text Fixed to Right</h5>
  </div>

  <div class="banner-body text-center">
    <div class="container">
      <h1 class="header">Text Fixed to Center</h1>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="banner-footer text-left">
    <h5>Text Fixed to Left</h5>
  </div>
</div>

Colors

Change the color of your banner using boba's color palette
Banner Header

Red

Banner Footer
<div class="banner red">
    <div class="banner-header">
        <h5 class="text-white">Banner Header</h5>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-body">
        <div class="container">
            <h1 class="header text-white">Red</h1>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-footer">
        <h5 class="text-white">Banner Footer</h5>
    </div>
</div>
Banner Header

        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="banner-footer">
    &   lth5>Banner Footer</h5>
    </div>
</div>
